cab.content:
Colonal W. Dally Jones.
THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.
?.
? 7210.
WAR CABINET.
TELEGRAM FROM VICEROY, FOREIGN & POLITICAL
DEPART. TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE FOR INDIA, dt. 6th MAY, 1919.
(Received 6th. 8. p.m.)
Clear the line.
Secret. Afghanistan. North West Frontier
Province reports at 3.25. p.m. on 6th.
Begins. Afghans have occupied Tor Sappar and Spina Tauka with three to four hundred Infantry and two guns. Ends.
